1.text: Scoop up the excess wet slime with a spoon.

2.text: Pick up the excess wet slime with a towel (alternatively).
2.vid: /2/2e/Clean Slime Out of Carpet Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Scrape off dry excess slime with a knife or spoon.
3.vid: /3/33/Clean Slime Out of Carpet Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Choose a distilled white vinegar to avoid discoloration.

5.vid: /9/99/Clean Slime Out of Carpet Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Shake to combine the vinegar and water.
6.vid: /5/5d/Clean Slime Out of Carpet Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Apply the vinegar solution onto the slime stain.
7.vid: /3/3e/Clean Slime Out of Carpet Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Let it rest for 5 to 10 minutes.

9.text: Pour hot water on the vinegar-soaked stain.
9.vid: /f/f8/Clean Slime Out of Carpet Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Blot the stained area with a towel.
10.vid: /3/39/Clean Slime Out of Carpet Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4

11.text: Repeat as needed until the stain is gone.

12.text: Add carpet stain remover for stubborn stains.

13.text: Let the carpet air dry completely.
